Name: Seeking Light
About the game: Seeking Light is an action adventure game in isometric perspective with a focus on boss fights. Take control of Sunny, a girl immersed in her subconscious world through meditation where she will have to face her fears in order to leave behind all the pain from the past. Breath in… Breath out… Ready? USE YOUR ENVIRONMENT TO FIGHT Break pillars to get broken stones, pick up bombs and jumping platforms to help yourself through the levels. BE BRAVE, LITTLE GIRL! Explore your inner world and collect the pieces of your childhood diary to confront the causes of your fears. KEY FEATURES: Tightly tuned controls. Dash, attack and throw objects to defeat your fears. Five world zones with their own identity and theme. Five unique boss fights. Collect pages of Sunny's diary to discover the details of her past. Solve puzzles and explore the world of Sunny’s inner mind.
